title: The Atomic Brain (Sci-Fi, 1963) The Ultimate Experiment in Terror! Colorized HD Quality

sources.title: The Atomic Brain (Sci-Fi, 1963) The Ultimate Experiment in Terror! Colorized HD Quality
sources.description:
From Human to Monster: The Ultimate Experiment in Terror!
An old woman uses her vast fortune to convince an eccentric yet brilliant scientist to transplant her brain into a young body. For this, she hires three strange young people, young and pretty, as servants and plans to choose one to become her new body shell...


Original title: Monstrosity (1963) AKA: The Atomic Brain / The Brain Snatchers 
This movie is subtitled in 30 languages.


Black & White version: https://youtu.be/P2WDFT3e970

Directors: Joseph V. Mascelli, Jack Pollexfen
Writers: Vy Russell, Sue Dwiggins 
Genres: Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi
Budget: $40,000 
Actors: 
Marjorie Eaton as Mrs. March
Frank Gerstle as Dr. Frank
Erika Peters as Nina
Judy Bamber as Bea
Xerxes the Cat 



00:00 Colorized movie (with subtitles). 
00:57 Unethical brain transplant experiments lead to monstrous creations and criminal activities.
10:17 A sinister experiment involving brain transplantation and young beautiful bodies unfolds.
28:19 A mysterious experiment involving brain transplants leads to terrifying consequences.
46:28 A doctor conducts experiments on human organs to preserve life and improve future generations.
52:40 A wealthy woman plans to transfer her brain into another body for control and revenge.


@CultCinemaClassics
